data.title: SportAnalytics on LinkedIn: Nelson Diogo Duarte’s Opponent Analysis Powered by the SportAnalytics…
data.meta_description:
Would you like to improve 📈  and speed-up 🏃‍♂️ opponent analysis? 

Nelson Diogo Duarte, a talented young analyst who has already worked with important teams…
data.text:
There is no better way to kick off the season than by raising a trophy! We are excited to celebrate the historic 1st #SuperCup victory with Royale Union Saint-Gilloise SCRL and proud to support them with our powerful #analysis solutions. Here’s to many more achievements together! 🚀 #USG #SportAnalytics #SuccessStory #MondayMotivation

We are delighted to share that we are renewing our commitment with Sport Lisboa e Benfica, the most #prestigious and #successful club in Liga Portugal! If you're looking to take your team's #performance to the next level, now is the time to explore what our platform can offer. #SLB #Benfica #SportAnalytics #DataDrivenSuccess

We are delighted to inform you about a fantastic opportunity for aspiring researchers. The Università degli Studi "Gabriele d'Annunzio" (Italy) is offering public selection for admission to their PhD programs for the academic year 2024/2025. SportAnalytics is proud to co-fund a #PhD #scholarship on an innovative research topic: 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗘𝗺𝗯𝗼𝗱𝗶𝗲𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝗰𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗠𝗮𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝗻 𝗗𝘆𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗦𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗘𝗻𝘃𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀. Scholarship Details: Duration: 3 years Application Deadline: 12:00 PM (Italian time) on July 21, 2024. Application Details: https://lnkd.in/d2xAnFzU This is a unique chance to immerse yourself in groundbreaking research and make significant contributions to the field of sports analytics. For additional information and to submit your application, please reach out to the Project Coordinator: Prof. Maurizio Bertollo at maurizio.bertollo@unich.it Embrace this opportunity to advance your academic journey and explore the dynamic world of sports environments. We are excited to welcome your application! #ResearchOpportunity #SportAnalytics #HigherEducation #DecisionMaking

We are happy to celebrate our ongoing #partnership with KV Kortrijk, the first club in Pro League to collaborate with us! We value the trust and long-term relationships with our clients, which are vital for mutual success. #KVK #SportAnalytics #DataDrivenDecisions

Stay ahead with the SportAnalytics 𝗔𝗜 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁! The 𝗔𝗜 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 understands and responds to your inquiries with artificial intelligence in real time, ensuring you maximize the SportAnalytics Platform for match analysis, team insights, player evaluations, and other critical sports analytics tasks. Our advanced AI-powered system, thanks to #LLM and #GenAI technologies, delivers actionable insights that empower sports professionals to make informed decisions! #ActionableInsights #SportAgent #SportAnalytics

At SportAnalytics, we bridge the gap for clubs by providing a unified evaluation system across #academies, #male, and #female teams. Today, few clubs have a cohesive approach to assessment across all their squads—this is where we step in. Empower your entire organization with consistent, data-driven insights that optimize performance and decision-making at every level. #SportsAnalytics #UnifiedEvaluation #DataDrivenClubs

We look forward to our collaboration with Havre Athletic Club for the new season! Since their journey from #Ligue2 to #Ligue1, we've been proud partners, supporting them with the SportAnalytics platform to gain a competitive edge through advanced match analysis and opponent insights. Bon courage pour la prochaine saison de Ligue 1! LFP - Ligue de Football Professionnel #HAC #SportAnalytics #Partnership
